description: This file defines a Java interface ReminderLogRepository that extends JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations for ReminderLog entities and includes a custom method to find logs by associated Invoice.

classes.name: ReminderLogRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for ReminderLog entity providing basic CRUD operations and custom query to find logs by Invoice.

methods.name: findByInvoice
methods.description: Finds a list of ReminderLog entries associated with a given Invoice.
